mapper.insert: insert into TENetGridEvent (EventID, EventName, EventKind, EventTypeValue, EventContent, EventStartDateTime, EventEndDateTime, EventHappenLongitude, EventHappenLatitude, EventStatusTypeValue, CurrentRemarks, CurrentResponsiblePersonCertID, CurrentResponsiblePersonName, CurrentResponsiblePersonContact, NetGridID) values (#{eventID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{eventName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventKind,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eventTypeValue,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{eventContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventStartDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{eventEndDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{eventHappenLongitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{eventHappenLatitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{eventStatusTypeValue,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{currentRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currentResponsiblePersonCertID,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{currentResponsiblePersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currentResponsiblePersonContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{netGridID,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update TENetGridEvent set EventName = #{eventName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EventKind = #{eventKind,jdbcType=INTEGER}, EventTypeValue = #{eventTypeValue,jdbcType=CHAR}, EventContent = #{eventContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EventStartDateTime = #{eventStartDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EventEndDateTime = #{eventEndDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EventHappenLongitude = #{eventHappenLongitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, EventHappenLatitude = #{eventHappenLatitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, EventStatusTypeValue = #{eventStatusTypeValue,jdbcType=CHAR}, CurrentRemarks = #{currentRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CurrentResponsiblePersonCertID = #{currentResponsiblePersonCertID,jdbcType=CHAR}, CurrentResponsiblePersonName = #{currentResponsiblePersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CurrentResponsiblePersonContact = #{currentResponsiblePersonContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NetGridID = #{netGridID,jdbcType=BIGINT} where EventID = #{eventID,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select EventID, EventName, EventKind, EventTypeValue, EventContent, EventStartDateTime, EventEndDateTime, EventHappenLongitude, EventHappenLatitude, EventStatusTypeValue, CurrentRemarks, CurrentResponsiblePersonCertID, CurrentResponsiblePersonName, CurrentResponsiblePersonContact, NetGridID from TENetGridEvent where EventID = #{eventID,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select EventID, EventName, EventKind, EventTypeName, EventContent, EventStartDateTime, EventEndDateTime, EventHappenLongitude, EventHappenLatitude, EventStatusTypeName, CurrentRemarks, CurrentResponsiblePersonCertID, CurrentResponsiblePersonName, CurrentResponsiblePersonContact, NetGridName,RealName,Dept,MobileTel from TENetGridEvent t1 left join TECODENetGridEventType t2 on t1.EventTypeValue=t2.EventTypeValue left join TECODENetGridEventStatusType t3 on t1.EventStatusTypeValue=t3.EventStatusTypeValue left join TENetGrid t4 on t1.NetGridID=t4.NetGridID left join TEUser t5 on t1.CurrentResponsiblePersonCertID=t5.UserID where EventID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select EventID, EventName, EventKind, EventTypeValue, EventContent, EventStartDateTime, EventEndDateTime, EventHappenLongitude, EventHappenLatitude, EventStatusTypeValue, CurrentRemarks, CurrentResponsiblePersonCertID, CurrentResponsiblePersonName, CurrentResponsiblePersonContact, NetGridID from TENetGridEvent

select tn.NetGridName,ifnull(ta.common,0) common,ifnull(ta.great,0) great from TENetGrid tn left join (SELECT t2.NetGridName,sum(case when t1.EventKind=1 then 1 else 0 end) common, sum(case when t1.EventKind=2 then 1 else 0 end) great FROM TENetGridEvent t1 left join TENetGrid t2 on t1.NetGridID=t2.NetGridID group by t2.NetGridName)ta on tn.NetGridName=ta.NetGridName where tn.FatherNetGridID=-1
